Name: Travel
Description: Nothing happens today. You traveled one step closer to the next town and used one day's food ration.

Name: Bison
Description: You saw some wild buffalo in the distance. They didn't bother you and you traveled along your way.

Name: Fork
Description: There is a fork in the trail. Do you want to go right toward the forest or left toward the plains?

Name: Berry
Description: You found a wild berry patch. Should you collect and eat them?

Name: Sickness
Description: You got sick and need to rest 1 extra day
